text: Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro, like his mentor Donald Trump, is an anti-science demagogue. The result: many thousands of Brazilians are unnecessarily dying. Science is not a luxury. It is the backbone of civilization. https://t.co/Xtv1wqfRFR
